PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-06492002-04-180,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  TB,  , 
PrecisAuthorization for the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION to sign, as lessee, a number of leases to be granted by ACKTION CORPORATION and 3683249 CANADA INC. for space in a building to be built at 180 Sparks Street in Ottawa, Ontario, and to enter into AGREEMENTS with the Crown concerning sub-letting and the purchase of that property at the end of the lease and for the disposal of its property at 275 Lanark Avenue in Ottawa.
Attachments
